resources.string: Enter the Gauge value in mm.
1. Convert wire mm size to commercially known size
Give the wire size in mm and you will get the wire size known commercially

1. First give the no of wires which you want to match with other wires
 	2. Put the wire sizes in text fields
 	3. Click the button Get COMB. Of Wires
 	4. Now you will see the best possible choice for your given wires
 	5. You can also give the Approximate value and Click See Matches
 	6. Now if you only want to see the combination in particular no of wires Click the Drop down button
 	7. The Approximate value is used to filter the wire combinations and this values shows that how much error you want in your combination like if your total area of wires is 1 and you gave the Approximate value=0.02 then all the combination having value between (1-0.02) to (1+0.02) will be shown
1. First give the no of wires which you want to match with other wires
2. Put the wire sizes in text fields
3. Click the button Get COMB. Of Wires
4. Now you will see the best possible choice for your given wires
5. You can also give the Approximate value and Click See Matches
6. Now if you only want to see the combination in particular no of wires Click the Drop down button

7. The Approximate value is used to filter the wire combinations and this values shows that how much error you want in your combination like if your total area of wires is 1 and you gave the Approximate value=0.02 then all the combination having value between (1-0.02) to (1+0.02) will be shown
